title: Demon Seed
description: Only a sacrifice will appease the overlord that has banished him from the only world he knows. And yet almost from the moment he captures Colette, Nuri is captivated and can think of nothing but possessing her himself.“This title is a reissue”Length: Long NovellaGenre: Fantasy RomanceRating: Erotica. Contains explicit sex and language, bondage, oral sex, sexual mastery
author: Desiree Acuna
